thread.section_title: Hotel Soft - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: short break
thread.title_full: short break - Review of Hotel Soft, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: manangurung192
title: short break
text: little late on writing a review, me and my wife had visited paris for our anniversary. we had booked a room online looking at the previous reviews. The gentleman on the front desk was very friendly and polite and ever so kind to upgrade our room. The hotel is situated in a great location, literally 5-7 mins walk to the train station(Gare de l'est) and plenty of restaurants nearby. The price is very reasonable for the quality service you receive. definitely will be coming back if we ever visit Paris again.
